First let me say thanks! I have tried several variations on the setup
with =
no luck, your help is most appreciated. The new machine is a Core
2 Duo run=
ning FC7 (this is my first experience with Fedora)

When looking at the deb=
ug output I found that it was unable to get a
commons-pool.pom from any of =
the 3 archives. I had manually downloaded
and installed the jar but when I =
look in the local repo there was no
pom. So I copy the pom in the repo and =
it worked. 

So I have a good build now, I will test tomorrow as it is late=
 here. 

Thanks 
-glen
